name: Coin Pusher - Lucky Dozer Game
description:
Welcome to this very funny and addictive coin push game! Easy to control and play, you just need to click the screen, drop the coins to receive different rewards. Now start to win coins, tokens, fruits and many gifts!
 
HOW TO PLAY:
 
◈ It’s totally FREE to play! One tap and easy control!
◈ Tap the blank area to drop coins and fruits.
◈ Coins dropped into the box will trigger the slot machine!
◈ Build a wall on the two sides of the board to stop the waste of dimes.
◈ Use "Shake" and drop a giant coin to splash coins on the table.
◈ Use "Wall" to protect coins on the table from falling down on both sides.
◈ Coins are available for free, use props to get rewards easily.
 
GAME FEATURES:
 
◈ Colorful and vibrant 3D graphics!
◈ The best physics of any coin pusher game!
◈ Tons of prizes to collect during your coin pusher adventure.
◈ Free to download, the best time killer!
 
Do you want to know if you are lucky enough? Download this lucky coin pusher game and play it now! All big prizes are waiting for you!
